volunteer_experience.info: - Organised street plays in rural areas in Kanpur to create awareness and clear misconceptions about AIDS.- Organised blood donation camps in IIT-Kanpur for blood bank in the local hospital. More than 100 donations were received.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Uttar Pradesh State AIDS control society
volunteer_experience.title: Awareness volunteer

projects: [{"title":"Towards Cleaner India: Tackling rural sanitation in India","start_date":"Sep 2013","description":"- Proposed comprehensive policy solution to tackle Rural sanitation in India covering all stages from Research, Implementation and Scaling to meet India's Millennium Development Goals.- Presented the solution before a 8000 strong audience including various stakeholders from policy-makers, business community and NGOs.- Created mass awareness through social media by encouraging 25000 people from all over India to read the proposal, share and provide feed-back for better implementation."},{},{"title":"Dynamic stability analysis of wrap-around supersonic artillery rockets","start_date":"Jun 2013","end_date":"Apr 2014","description":"-Studied Wrap-around fin aerodynamics for supersonic Mach numbers using computational fluid dynamic simulations-Solved 6 DOF equation using MATLAB for the motion of the WAF rocket to understand its stability criterion-Result: Successfully simulated the instability elimination possible through fin design change. Demonstrated through computational simulation a 30% increase in horizontal range of the rocket as a result of the increased stability."}]
